definition: A method of sending a written communication or package that provides proof of delivery and requires a recipient's signature upon receipt. It is commonly used for sending important documents, valuable items, or sensitive materials.

examples.german: Ich habe das Einschreiben gestern abgeschickt.
examples.english: I sent the registered letter yesterday.

examples.german: Das Einschreiben ist noch nicht angekommen.
examples.english: The registered letter has not arrived yet.

examples.german: Bitte schicken Sie das Dokument per Einschreiben.
examples.english: Please send the document by registered mail.
The registered letter was successfully delivered.

examples.german: Ich habe das Einschreiben pers√∂nlich abgeholt.
examples.english: I personally picked up the registered letter.
